headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Drop Zone
content: Drop out of a hovering Cargobob from on high, rip your chute, and fight for control of a small patch of land in Drop Zone. Coordinating with teammates to plan your attack puts you at a significant advantage when contesting for the Zone, so keep your comms open and your aim sharp. Earn 2X GTA$ and RP for competing, all week long.
